VibeAff API

Developer Documentation

vibeaff.com â†’

VibeAff API Reference

Complete REST API documentation for the VibeAff affiliate marketing platform.

Base URL

https://api.vibeaff.com

Authentication

All authenticated endpoints require a Bearer token in the Authorization header.

curl -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_TOKEN" \
     https://api.vibeaff.com/v1/auth/me

Rate Limits

API requests are rate-limited to 1,000 requests/minute per API key. Rate limit headers (X-RateLimit-Remaining) are included in every response.

Auth

POST/v1/auth/register

Register a new user account with email and password.

Request Body

{
  "email": "user@example.com",
  "password": "s3cur3Pa$$word",
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "role": "merchant"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "usr_abc123",
  "email": "user@example.com",
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "role": "merchant",
  "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIs...",
  "createdAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
}
POST/v1/auth/login

Authenticate with email & password and receive a JWT.

Request Body

{
  "email": "user@example.com",
  "password": "s3cur3Pa$$word"
}

Response 200

{
  "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIs...",
  "expiresIn": 86400,
  "user": {
    "id": "usr_abc123",
    "email": "user@example.com",
    "role": "merchant"
  }
}
GET/v1/auth/me

Return the currently authenticated user profile.

Response 200

{
  "id": "usr_abc123",
  "email": "user@example.com",
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "role": "merchant",
  "createdAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
}

Merchants

GET/v1/merchants

List all merchants. Supports pagination via ?page and ?limit query params.

Response 200

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "mrc_001",
      "name": "Acme Corp",
      "domain": "acme.com",
      "status": "active"
    },
    {
      "id": "mrc_002",
      "name": "Globex Inc",
      "domain": "globex.io",
      "status": "active"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 20,
    "total": 2
  }
}
POST/v1/merchants

Create a new merchant account.

Request Body

{
  "name": "Acme Corp",
  "domain": "acme.com",
  "contactEmail": "partner@acme.com",
  "category": "saas"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "mrc_001",
  "name": "Acme Corp",
  "domain": "acme.com",
  "contactEmail": "partner@acme.com",
  "category": "saas",
  "status": "active",
  "createdAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
}

Affiliates

GET/v1/affiliates

List all affiliates. Supports filtering by ?status and ?programId.

Response 200

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "aff_001",
      "name": "BloggerMax",
      "email": "max@blog.com",
      "status": "active",
      "totalEarnings": 1240.5
    },
    {
      "id": "aff_002",
      "name": "SocialSara",
      "email": "sara@social.io",
      "status": "active",
      "totalEarnings": 870
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 20,
    "total": 2
  }
}
POST/v1/affiliates

Create a new affiliate profile.

Request Body

{
  "name": "BloggerMax",
  "email": "max@blog.com",
  "website": "https://bloggermax.com",
  "payoutMethod": "paypal"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "aff_001",
  "name": "BloggerMax",
  "email": "max@blog.com",
  "website": "https://bloggermax.com",
  "payoutMethod": "paypal",
  "status": "pending",
  "createdAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
}

Programs

GET/v1/programs

List all affiliate programs across merchants.

Response 200

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "prg_001",
      "merchantId": "mrc_001",
      "name": "Acme Referral Program",
      "commissionType": "percentage",
      "commissionValue": 15,
      "cookieDays": 30,
      "status": "active"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 20,
    "total": 1
  }
}
POST/v1/merchants/:id/programs

Create a new affiliate program for a merchant.

Request Body

{
  "name": "Acme Referral Program",
  "commissionType": "percentage",
  "commissionValue": 15,
  "cookieDays": 30,
  "terms": "Standard 30-day cookie, 15% recurring commission."
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "prg_001",
  "merchantId": "mrc_001",
  "name": "Acme Referral Program",
  "commissionType": "percentage",
  "commissionValue": 15,
  "cookieDays": 30,
  "status": "active",
  "createdAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
}

Campaigns

GET/v1/campaigns

List all campaigns. Filter with ?programId or ?status.

Response 200

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "cmp_001",
      "programId": "prg_001",
      "name": "Spring Sale 2026",
      "startDate": "2026-03-01",
      "endDate": "2026-03-31",
      "budget": 5000,
      "status": "scheduled"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 20,
    "total": 1
  }
}
POST/v1/campaigns

Create a new marketing campaign.

Request Body

{
  "programId": "prg_001",
  "name": "Spring Sale 2026",
  "startDate": "2026-03-01",
  "endDate": "2026-03-31",
  "budget": 5000,
  "landingUrl": "https://acme.com/spring"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "cmp_001",
  "programId": "prg_001",
  "name": "Spring Sale 2026",
  "startDate": "2026-03-01",
  "endDate": "2026-03-31",
  "budget": 5000,
  "landingUrl": "https://acme.com/spring",
  "status": "scheduled",
  "createdAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
}

Links

GET/v1/links

List all tracking links. Filter with ?affiliateId or ?campaignId.

Response 200

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "lnk_001",
      "affiliateId": "aff_001",
      "campaignId": "cmp_001",
      "code": "SPRING25",
      "url": "https://api.vibeaff.com/t/SPRING25",
      "clicks": 342,
      "conversions": 28
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 20,
    "total": 1
  }
}
POST/v1/links

Create a new tracking link.

Request Body

{
  "affiliateId": "aff_001",
  "campaignId": "cmp_001",
  "customCode": "SPRING25",
  "destinationUrl": "https://acme.com/spring"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "lnk_001",
  "affiliateId": "aff_001",
  "campaignId": "cmp_001",
  "code": "SPRING25",
  "url": "https://api.vibeaff.com/t/SPRING25",
  "destinationUrl": "https://acme.com/spring",
  "createdAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
}
GET/t/:code

Public redirect endpoint. Tracks the click and redirects user to the destination URL.

Response 200

{
  "status": 302,
  "headers": {
    "Location": "https://acme.com/spring?ref=SPRING25"
  }
}

Conversions

GET/v1/conversions

List all conversions. Filter by ?affiliateId, ?status, or date range.

Response 200

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "cnv_001",
      "linkId": "lnk_001",
      "affiliateId": "aff_001",
      "amount": 99,
      "commission": 14.85,
      "status": "approved",
      "convertedAt": "2026-02-04T14:30:00Z"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 20,
    "total": 1
  }
}
POST/v1/conversions

Record a new conversion (server-to-server postback).

Request Body

{
  "linkId": "lnk_001",
  "orderId": "order_7890",
  "amount": 99,
  "currency": "USD",
  "metadata": {
    "sku": "PRO_PLAN",
    "quantity": 1
  }
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "cnv_001",
  "linkId": "lnk_001",
  "affiliateId": "aff_001",
  "orderId": "order_7890",
  "amount": 99,
  "commission": 14.85,
  "currency": "USD",
  "status": "pending",
  "createdAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
}

Payouts

GET/v1/payouts

List all payouts with optional ?status filter.

Response 200

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "pay_001",
      "affiliateId": "aff_001",
      "amount": 500,
      "currency": "USD",
      "method": "paypal",
      "status": "pending",
      "createdAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 20,
    "total": 1
  }
}
POST/v1/payouts

Create a new payout request.

Request Body

{
  "affiliateId": "aff_001",
  "amount": 500,
  "currency": "USD",
  "method": "paypal",
  "note": "January 2026 commissions"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "pay_001",
  "affiliateId": "aff_001",
  "amount": 500,
  "currency": "USD",
  "method": "paypal",
  "status": "pending",
  "createdAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
}
POST/v1/payouts/:id/approve

Approve a pending payout.

Request Body

{
  "note": "Approved by admin"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "pay_001",
  "status": "approved",
  "approvedBy": "usr_abc123",
  "approvedAt": "2026-02-05T12:00:00Z"
}
POST/v1/payouts/:id/hold

Place a payout on hold for review.

Request Body

{
  "reason": "Pending fraud review"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "pay_001",
  "status": "held",
  "heldBy": "usr_abc123",
  "heldAt": "2026-02-05T12:00:00Z",
  "reason": "Pending fraud review"
}
POST/v1/payouts/:id/release

Release a held payout for processing.

Request Body

{
  "note": "Fraud review cleared"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "pay_001",
  "status": "approved",
  "releasedBy": "usr_abc123",
  "releasedAt": "2026-02-05T13:00:00Z"
}
POST/v1/payouts/:id/reject

Reject a payout request.

Request Body

{
  "reason": "Duplicate payout request"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "pay_001",
  "status": "rejected",
  "rejectedBy": "usr_abc123",
  "rejectedAt": "2026-02-05T12:00:00Z",
  "reason": "Duplicate payout request"
}

Channels

GET/v1/channels

List all marketing channels.

Response 200

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "chn_001",
      "name": "Instagram",
      "type": "social",
      "affiliateId": "aff_001",
      "url": "https://instagram.com/bloggermax",
      "status": "verified"
    },
    {
      "id": "chn_002",
      "name": "Tech Blog",
      "type": "website",
      "affiliateId": "aff_001",
      "url": "https://bloggermax.com",
      "status": "verified"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 20,
    "total": 2
  }
}
POST/v1/channels

Register a new marketing channel.

Request Body

{
  "name": "Instagram",
  "type": "social",
  "url": "https://instagram.com/bloggermax",
  "platform": "instagram"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "chn_001",
  "name": "Instagram",
  "type": "social",
  "url": "https://instagram.com/bloggermax",
  "platform": "instagram",
  "status": "pending_verification",
  "createdAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
}
PUT/v1/channels/:id

Update an existing channel.

Request Body

{
  "name": "Instagram Main",
  "url": "https://instagram.com/bloggermax_official"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "chn_001",
  "name": "Instagram Main",
  "url": "https://instagram.com/bloggermax_official",
  "status": "verified",
  "updatedAt": "2026-02-05T11:00:00Z"
}
DELETE/v1/channels/:id

Remove a channel.

Response 200

{
  "deleted": true,
  "id": "chn_001"
}

Integrations

GET/v1/integrations

List all connected integrations for the current merchant.

Response 200

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "int_001",
      "provider": "shopify",
      "status": "connected",
      "connectedAt": "2026-01-15T10:00:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "int_002",
      "provider": "stripe",
      "status": "connected",
      "connectedAt": "2026-01-20T10:00:00Z"
    }
  ]
}
POST/v1/integrations/connect

Initiate a new integration connection.

Request Body

{
  "provider": "shopify",
  "config": {
    "shopDomain": "mystore.myshopify.com",
    "apiKey": "shpka_..."
  }
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "int_001",
  "provider": "shopify",
  "status": "connected",
  "connectedAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
}
POST/v1/integrations/callback

Handle an incoming webhook callback from an integration provider.

Request Body

{
  "provider": "shopify",
  "event": "order/created",
  "payload": {
    "orderId": "5678",
    "total": 149.99,
    "currency": "USD"
  }
}

Response 200

{
  "received": true,
  "conversionId": "cnv_002"
}
POST/v1/integrations/:id/disconnect

Disconnect an active integration.

Request Body

{
  "reason": "Switching to a different provider"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "int_001",
  "status": "disconnected",
  "disconnectedAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
}
GET/v1/integrations/oauth/:provider

Get the OAuth authorization URL for a provider.

Response 200

{
  "provider": "google",
  "authUrl": "https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/auth?client_id=...&redirect_uri=...&scope=...",
  "state": "oauthstate_abc123"
}
GET/v1/integrations/oauth/callback

Handle OAuth callback. Exchange the authorization code for tokens.

Response 200

{
  "id": "int_003",
  "provider": "google",
  "status": "connected",
  "connectedAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
}

Creative Tools

GET/v1/creative-tools

List available creative assets (banners, widgets, etc.).

Response 200

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "crt_001",
      "name": "Spring Banner 728x90",
      "type": "banner",
      "format": "image/png",
      "dimensions": "728x90",
      "url": "https://cdn.vibeaff.com/creatives/crt_001.png"
    },
    {
      "id": "crt_002",
      "name": "Product Widget",
      "type": "widget",
      "format": "html",
      "embedCode": "<script src=\"...\"></script>"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 20,
    "total": 2
  }
}
POST/v1/creative-tools

Upload a new creative asset.

Request Body

{
  "name": "Summer Banner 300x250",
  "type": "banner",
  "format": "image/png",
  "dimensions": "300x250",
  "campaignId": "cmp_001",
  "fileBase64": "iVBORw0KGgo..."
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "crt_003",
  "name": "Summer Banner 300x250",
  "type": "banner",
  "url": "https://cdn.vibeaff.com/creatives/crt_003.png",
  "createdAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
}
PUT/v1/creative-tools/:id

Update metadata for a creative asset.

Request Body

{
  "name": "Summer Banner 300x250 v2",
  "campaignId": "cmp_002"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "crt_003",
  "name": "Summer Banner 300x250 v2",
  "campaignId": "cmp_002",
  "updatedAt": "2026-02-05T11:00:00Z"
}
DELETE/v1/creative-tools/:id

Delete a creative asset.

Response 200

{
  "deleted": true,
  "id": "crt_003"
}

Creatives

POST/v1/creatives/generate-copy

Generate marketing copy using AI for a product or campaign.

Request Body

{
  "productName": "Acme Pro Plan",
  "tone": "professional",
  "targetAudience": "SaaS founders",
  "maxLength": 280,
  "language": "en"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "copy_001",
  "text": "Scale your affiliate program effortlessly with Acme Pro â€” built for SaaS founders who want results, not busywork.",
  "tokens": 22,
  "language": "en"
}
POST/v1/creatives/generate-image

Generate a promotional image using AI.

Request Body

{
  "prompt": "Modern SaaS dashboard with affiliate metrics, dark theme, minimal",
  "dimensions": "1200x630",
  "style": "photorealistic"
}

Response 200

{
  "id": "img_001",
  "url": "https://cdn.vibeaff.com/generated/img_001.png",
  "dimensions": "1200x630",
  "createdAt": "2026-02-05T10:00:00Z"
}
POST/v1/creatives/translate

Translate marketing copy to another language.

Request Body

{
  "text": "Scale your affiliate program effortlessly.",
  "targetLanguage": "es",
  "preserveTone": true
}

Response 200

{
  "original": "Scale your affiliate program effortlessly.",
  "translated": "Escala tu programa de afiliados sin esfuerzo.",
  "targetLanguage": "es",
  "confidence": 0.97
}

Gamification

GET/v1/leaderboard

Get the affiliate leaderboard rankings. Filter by ?programId and ?period (day, week, month).

Response 200

{
  "period": "month",
  "data": [
    {
      "rank": 1,
      "affiliateId": "aff_001",
      "name": "BloggerMax",
      "conversions": 142,
      "revenue": 12480,
      "commission": 1872
    },
    {
      "rank": 2,
      "affiliateId": "aff_002",
      "name": "SocialSara",
      "conversions": 98,
      "revenue": 8750,
      "commission": 1312.5
    },
    {
      "rank": 3,
      "affiliateId": "aff_003",
      "name": "TechTim",
      "conversions": 67,
      "revenue": 5980,
      "commission": 897
    }
  ]
}
GET/v1/affiliates/:id/stats

Get detailed performance statistics for an affiliate.

Response 200

{
  "affiliateId": "aff_001",
  "totalClicks": 15420,
  "totalConversions": 842,
  "conversionRate": 5.46,
  "totalRevenue": 74200,
  "totalCommission": 11130,
  "avgOrderValue": 88.12,
  "topCampaigns": [
    {
      "campaignId": "cmp_001",
      "name": "Spring Sale 2026",
      "conversions": 210,
      "revenue": 18500
    }
  ],
  "badges": [
    "top_performer",
    "100_conversions",
    "streak_30d"
  ]
}

Admin

GET/v1/metrics

Get platform-wide metrics and KPIs. Requires admin role.

Response 200

{
  "totalMerchants": 124,
  "totalAffiliates": 3842,
  "totalConversions": 28491,
  "totalRevenue": 2450000,
  "totalCommissionsPaid": 367500,
  "activePrograms": 89,
  "activeCampaigns": 156,
  "monthOverMonth": {
    "revenue": 12.4,
    "conversions": 8.7,
    "affiliates": 15.2
  }
}
GET/v1/audit-logs

Retrieve audit logs. Filter by ?userId, ?action, ?from, ?to.

Response 200

{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "log_001",
      "userId": "usr_abc123",
      "action": "payout.approved",
      "resourceType": "payout",
      "resourceId": "pay_001",
      "ip": "203.0.113.42",
      "timestamp": "2026-02-05T12:00:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "log_002",
      "userId": "usr_abc123",
      "action": "merchant.created",
      "resourceType": "merchant",
      "resourceId": "mrc_003",
      "ip": "203.0.113.42",
      "timestamp": "2026-02-05T11:30:00Z"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 50,
    "total": 2
  }
}

API Playground
